Transcriber is an open-source, self-hosted web application that leverages AI (Whisper) to transcribe audio and video files or YouTube URLs. It prioritizes privacy and speed, offering GPU acceleration and a user-friendly interface with features like transcript history and temporary media cleanup.

ExploitDB-Hunter is a lightweight Python command-line tool designed to simplify the process of searching and downloading exploits from Exploit-DB. It offers an interactive terminal interface, eliminating the need to manually browse the website and copy exploit code.

ProximityLockSystem is a Python-based CLI tool that automatically locks your computer when your paired Bluetooth device moves out of range. It continuously monitors nearby devices, providing a privacy-first security solution for users who frequently step away from their workstations.

Storybook is a development environment for building UI components in isolation. It provides a workshop for developers to create, test, and document components independently of the main application, supporting a wide range of frameworks and offering numerous addons for enhanced functionality.

ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

TUIOS is a terminal-based window manager built with Go, offering a modern, efficient interface for managing multiple terminal sessions. It features a vim-like modal interface, comprehensive keyboard shortcuts, workspace support, and mouse interaction, leveraging the Charm stack (Bubble Tea v2 and Lipgloss v2).
